mapper.select: select no, title, content, place, start_date, end_date, importance, latitude, longitude from t_schedule where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update t_schedule set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, place = #{place}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, importance= #{importance}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into t_schedule( no, title, content, place, start_date, end_date, importance, latitude, longitude ) values( seq_t_schedule_no.nextVal, #{title}, #{content}, #{place}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{importance}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
